member.name: HDLAYOUT
member.summary: Contains information used to set the size and position of a header control. HDLAYOUT is used with the HDM_LAYOUT message. This structure supersedes theHD_LAYOUT structure.

member.name: HDLAYOUT.prc
member.summary: Structure that contains the coordinates of a rectangle that the header control will occupy.

member.name: HDLAYOUT.pwpos
member.summary: Structure that receives information about the appropriate size and position of the header control.
